# endFrame

**Instance Property**

The size and location of the overlay at the end of the transition.

## Declaration

```swift
var endFrame: CGRect { get }
```

## Adding an Animation

- **addAnimation(_:)**: Adds a closure you can use to animate view properties.
- **startFrame**: The size and location of the overlay before the transition.
